After a cameo appearance by Ed, he has a new owner. SOLD

Here is an opportunity to own one of the iconic cards in the T204 set—Eddie Plank. The card is affordable because of the cut-out surgery performed by the presumed original owner. If you are interested, or have questions, please email: [url]mpeich12@gmial.com[/url]. No PMs, please. 

[STRIKE]$275[/STRIKE] 
Price includes shipping, and may be made by PP f/f: [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url]


Thank you for looking!

Cheers,
Mike

Eddie is making a "cameo" appearance, you might say.
GLWS!
